title: Total Mess Over Lobbying (with Peter Bone MP)
itunes:title: Total Mess Over Lobbying (with Peter Bone MP)
description:
Peter Bone, Conservative MP for Wellingborough says the government's handling of the Paterson lobbying crisis was a total mess. He tells Bloomberg's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts that Conservatives had a procedural issue, not a 'sleaze' problem.

Jagjit Chadha, director of NIESR discusses the cost of living pressures that voters are increasingly going to face in 2022. Plus Scottish First Minister Nicola Sturgeon speaks to Bloomberg about COP26.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
